title: Slimmer than the normal stencil, but is there a base font?
content:
I’ve been looking my eyes out on myfonts ect. and might be blind, but I belive this is just “added” stencil on some font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209030539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ndsfont_6146.jpg)

 [‹ Help pls looking for a light type](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209030539/http:/typophile.com/node/52444 "Go to previous forum topic") [Trying to replicate album cover art for Xmas project... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209030539/http:/typophile.com/node/52437 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pisosse

You guys keep to amaze me.. big thanks!
